section.heading: Articles of incorporation and amendments—Copies to be furnished to department

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.15 > Section 74.15.070 74.15.060 << 74.15.070 >> 74.15.080 PDF RCW 74.15.070 Articles of incorporation and amendments — Copies to be furnished to department. A copy of the articles of incorporation of any agency or amendments to the articles of existing corporation agencies shall be sent by the secretary of state to the department at the time such articles or amendments are filed. [ 2017 3rd sp.s. c 6 s 411 ; 1979 c 141 s 358 ; 1967 c 172 s 7 .] NOTES: Effective date — 2017 3rd sp.s. c 6 ss 102, 104-115, 201-227, 301-337, 401-419, 501-513, 801-803, and 805-822: See note following RCW 43.216.025 . Conflict with federal requirements — 2017 3rd sp.s. c 6: See RCW 43.216.908 .
